author: joes
msg: Fix bug in table set/add: SvPV will convert numeric types to strings, so those are safe to set/add.  Just test SvOK now instead of SvPOK to admit them.

author: joes
msg: LTLIBS shouldn't require --ldflags, and CPPFLAGS needs to be supplemented with those from apr-config (esp -D_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE is missing).
